title: Dark October
overview: Based on a story, Dark October tells the story of four university students in Nigeria, who went to a particular area in search of a debtor who owed one of them. Unfortunately, the debtor raised a false alarm and alleged that the boys came to rob him of his valuables; mobs then paraded the boys as thieves and killed them

casts.name: Chuks Joseph, OKpara Munachi, Kelechukwu Oriaku, Boman Bognet, Chibie Johnny,
